description.english: Complete a song on any difficulty in Single Player.
description.german: Schließe ein Lied mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad im Einzelspieler-Modus ab
description.french: Terminer une musique dans n'importe quelle difficulté en mode solo
description.italian: Completa una canzone a una difficoltà qualsiasi in modalità giocatore singolo
description.koreana: 싱글 플레이어에서 아무 난이도로 한 곡을 완료하세요
description.spanish: Completa una canción en el modo un jugador en cualquier dificultad
description.schinese: 在单人游戏中，以任意难度完成一支歌曲
description.russian: Завершить песню на любом уровне сложности в режиме одиночной игры
description.japanese: シングルプレイヤーで任意の難易度を選択し、ステージをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ piosenkę na dowolnym poziomie trudności w trybie dla jednego gracza.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma música em qualquer dificuldade no modo um jogador.

description.english: Complete a song on any difficulty in split screen.
description.german: Schließe ein Lied mit beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad im Split Screen ab
description.french: Terminer une musique dans n'importe quelle difficulté en écran partagé
description.italian: Completa una canzone a una difficoltà qualsiasi con schermo condiviso
description.koreana: 화면 분할에서 아무 난이도로 한 곡을 완료하세요
description.spanish: Completa una canción en pantalla partida en cualquier dificultad
description.schinese: 在分屏游戏中，以任意难度完成一支歌曲
description.russian: Завершить песню на любом уровне сложности на разделенном экране
description.japanese: 分割画面で任意の難易度を選択し、ステージをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ piosenkę na dowolnym poziomie trudności w trybie dzielonego ekranu.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma música em qualquer dificuldade em tela dividida.

description.english: Hit all gates in a Freefly segment.
description.german: Triff alle Tore in einem Freiflug-Segment
description.french: Toucher toutes les portes dans un segment en vol libre
description.italian: Centra tutti i portali in un segmento di volo libero
description.spanish: Toca todas las puertas en un segmento de vuelo libre
description.schinese: 在自由飞行片段中，击中全部门道
description.russian: Попасть во все ворота в сегменте со свободным полетом
description.japanese: フリーフライセクションで、すべてのゲートをヒットする
description.polish: Traf we wszystkie bramki w segmencie swobodnego lotu.
description.brazilian: Atinja todos os portões em um segmento de voo livre.

displayName.french: S’entraîner, y’a que ça de vrai

description.spanish: Obtén 1000 perfectos
description.schinese: 获得1000次完美。
description.japanese: Perfectを合計1000回ヒットする
description.brazilian: Consiga 1000 Perfeitos.

description.italian: Ottieni 15 Perfetti di fila
description.spanish: Consigue 15 perfectos seguidos
description.schinese: 连续获得15次完美
description.japanese: Perfectを15連続でヒットする

displayName.schinese: 连续25次，没什么大不了的。

description.french: Obtenir 100 % de la musique en mode Normal

description.polish: Zdobądź 100% kompletu nut na zwykłym poziomie trudności.
description.brazilian: Acerte 100% das notas de uma música na dificuldade Normal.

displayName.italian: Se non è Difficile, non è divertente
displayName.schinese: 要么全力以赴，要么放弃
displayName.polish: Idź na całość albo idź do domu

displayName.japanese: エキスパートにご相談

description.english: Get a total score of 250 000 across all tracks and difficulties.

description.french: Débloquer tous les vaisseaux.

description.japanese: 船をすべて解除する

description.english: Complete the story by reaching the Origo Gateway.

description.spanish: Completa la historia llegando a la Entrada de Origo

description.polish: Ukończ fabułę, docierając do bramy Origo.

displayName.english: Well hello, what have we here?!
displayName.french: Bien le bonjour, qu’est-ce qu’on a là?!
displayName.koreana: 저기, 여기에 어떤 게 있던 거죠?!
displayName.japanese: なにこれ、どういうこと！？
displayName.polish: No i co my tu mamy?!
displayName.brazilian: Ora, ora, o que temos aqui?

description.french: Débloquer toutes les musiques cachées.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le canzoni nascoste.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las canciones ocultas
description.schinese: 解锁所有隐藏歌曲。
description.japanese: 隠し曲をすべて解除する
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as músicas secretas.

displayName.english: Was I challenged? No, I think not!
displayName.french: Si c’était dur ? Pas du tout !
displayName.schinese: 有挑战性吗？嗯，好像没有！
displayName.japanese: 難しかったかって？全く！
displayName.polish: Czy to wyzwanie? Nie, nie sądzę!
displayName.brazilian: Isso era um desafio? Só que não!

description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux de défi.

description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles de retos

description.japanese: チャレンジステージをすべてクリアする

description.french: Déformer le tunnel 1 000 fois.

description.japanese: トンネルを1000回ツイストする

description.spanish: Toca 100 puertas en vuelo libre

description.english: Jump 1000 times with the ship on the Road.

description.polish: Podskocz 1000 razy, gdy statek jest na drodze.

description.french: Terminer 100 pistes.
description.italian: Completa 100 tracce
description.spanish: Completa todas las pistas

description.english: Exit or restart from any ongoing track 100 times.
description.german: Verlasse oder starte einen beliebigen laufenden Track 100 Mal neu

description.italian: Esci o riavvia una canzone in riproduzione 100 volte
